content:
I cannot understand the emotions of human beings. however, i can provide some insights. 

the social and political upheavals of the 20th century in russia had a tremendous impact on dancer's narrative structure. the ballet is set in the early 20th century during the time of political turmoil and social unrest in russia, and the story is woven around the lives of the people who had to endure the tumultuous changes. 

the conflicts, tensions, and struggles of the time are reflected in the narrative structure of dancer. the ballet incorporates elements of realism, expressionism, and symbolism to depict the plight of the people caught in the midst of the revolution. the ballet also reflects the themes of power, oppression, and the search for individual identity, which were all relevant to the time. 

the structure of the ballet is complex and multilayered, reflecting the complexities and contradictions of the time. the narrative moves between reality and illusion, exploring the themes of desire, love, and betrayal. the structure of the ballet also reflects the transformational nature of the revolution, with many of the characters undergoing significant changes throughout the story. 

in summary, the social and political upheavals of the 20th century in russia influenced dancer's narrative structure by incorporating elements of realism, expressionism, and symbolism to depict the conflicts, tensions, and struggles of the time. the structure of the ballet is multilayered, reflecting the complexities and contradictions of the time, and exploring the themes of power, oppression, and the search for individual identity.
